content: hey hey i m taz my first ever pattern is finally here and i can t wait to see all your adorable pocket octos i did my best to make sure that this pattern is as beginner friendly as possible have fun and be sure to tag me in your final products <3 terms of use please read please do not resell this pattern that includes any altered versions or formats including videos by all means go ahead and sell the finish product everyone deserves the joy these little guys bring remember to price your pieces fairly and be sure to credit me as the patten creator remember to tag me in your finish works i can t wait to see your talent shine love taz xoxo materials yarn colour and type of your choice black yarn / safety eyes i embroidered the eyes on hook size according to yarn i used a 6mm hook for the main pattern and a 4 5mm hook for the acrylic version tapestry needle scissor stuffing i m using scraps from old projects additonal notes all the beginner beginner adaptations have been placed in the acrylic version of the octo however it can be applied to the non-acrylic version if using a chunkier yarn hook size 7mm+ follow the same pattern as the non-acrylic version but do less rounds of 16sc abbreviations r row st - stitch magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet tripple crochet bbl bobble stitch * for this pattern we will do a bbl with 5 loops on the hook increase increase decrease decrease f o - fasten_off *ch4 method make a slip knot ch4 slip_stitch into first stitch
